channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocking driveway, 25th January
item.description:
Hello, Hope you are well We came home at about 11.50 am to a blocked driveway. We need 24 hour access to our driveway. We are expecting a delivery soon. Could you help us sort this please? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Doverdale Drive, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface around the drain breaking up with one part about 9cm deep, 25th January
item.description:
Western end of bridge on Church Lane over Normans Brook. The drain cover has sunk about 5cm below the road surface. The drain at the eastern end of the bridge also has a 3-4cm hole by it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath is impassable due to slurry at least 40cm deep, 25th January
item.description:
There are three footpaths leading to a pedestrian access gate. All are impassable and will remain so until a significant period of dry warm weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witcombe Roman Villa, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously reported road damage getting much worse - trip hazard, 25th January
item.description:
